answers.answer: You can have liposuction with the listed medical conditions provided they all all under good medical control and you have agreement between both your primary care physician and your plastic surgeon, who have communicated with each other.  Any underlying medical condition may increase the risk of an adverse reaction in terms of healing and a potential reaction to surgery as a result of the condition.

question: can I have smartliposuction with diabetes, fibermyagia, lyme disease, ra, racing heart are there any risk factors?
title: smart lipo and diabetes II
